summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2876 for the improvement of the Easterly Side of Franklin Avenue, from East Howe Street to East Newton Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with such wooden crosswalks as may be necessary; by providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 34967, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
